item.title: AI for health (goal n°3 of Sustainable Development Goal)
item.description: 🛰️ Subject Use AI to help children with ASD in terms of socially and emotional abilities in society. 📜 Papers references Socially assistive robots for teaching emotional abilities to children with autism spectrum disorder Improving social skills in children with ASD using a long-term, in-home social robot 📝 Research 🚧 WIP
